Params:

User object corresponding to data or None if the file is not found

pizdyuk.pzd_threading module¶

class pizdyuk.pzd_threading.Pizdyuk_Thread(func, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: threading.Thread

Thread class

on_error = <pzd_events.TypedEvent object>¶

(TypedEvent[object]): event which is triggered if the run() successfully terminated. The returned result of the func() is the argument of the event.

on_finished = <pzd_events.Event object>¶

(TypedEvent[object]): event which is triggered if an error was raised during run() execution. The error raised is the argument of the event.

on_started = <pzd_events.Event object>¶

(Event): event which is triggered on thread finish

on_success = <pzd_events.TypedEvent object>¶
run()[source]¶

Runnable function of Thread.
